scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT modelname='staff', 
        [IdPersona] as sqlid,
     [Persona] as name,
     [Operativo]  as isactive ,
     [Interno]   as isinternal,
     [CF] as cf ,
     [DataNascita] as birthdate,
     [LuogoNascita]  as birthplace,
     [Telefono]  as tel,
     [Cellulare]  as mobile,
     [Indirizzo]  as address,
     [Comune] AS city,
     [Provincia] as region,
     [CAP] as zip

  FROM [dbo].[CantierePersone]',
